features: Anti-colic: Closer to Nature nipples feature an innovative anti-colic valve which prevents excessive air from getting into your baby’s milk, helping to reduce the symptoms of colic

Natural latch: Our bottle nipples are made from soft silicone and have a special breast-like shape that encourages a natural latch and prevents nipple confusion when switching between breast, bottle and back again
Natural pace: The soft silicone nipple flexes and stretches like mom and allows your baby to feed comfortably at their own pace
Most recommended baby bottle*: 95% of moms would recommend Tommee Tippee Closer to Nature bottles
100% leakproof: When the screw ring, nipple and cap are all secured, your baby bottle is completely mess-free and leakproof, even if it’s turned upside down or shaken
body.description: Inspired by moms and designed by experts, our Closer to Nature Baby Bottle has an extra-wide neck and breast-like nipple to help your baby have the most natural bottle-feeding experience. Made from super soft silicone, the nipple has a special breast-like shape that encourages a natural latch and prevents nipple confusion when switching between bottle and breast. This works by mimicking the flex and movement of moms breast, allowing your baby to feed at a pace that feels comfortable and natural to them. It also features an anti-colic valve to prevent the symptoms of colic by ensuring your little one ingests more milk and less air. For added peace of mind, the Closer to Nature baby bottle is completely mess-free and leakproof when the screw ring, nipple and cap are all secured (even if its turned upside down or shaken). Its also 100% BPA free so its safe for your baby. Tommee Tippee Closer to Nature baby bottles are available in a wide range of sizes, colors and decorations. This bottle comes with a slow flow nipple thats suitable for 0+ months. Nipples are available in a range of flow rates too, so the milk can flow faster as your baby gets hungrier! However you choose to feed your baby - whether its breast milk, formula or a bit of both - our Closer to Nature Anti-Colic bottles are #1 for easily switching between bottle and breast*. *Based on an independent survey of 1,006 UK moms of 0-12m who have used bottles, Feb 2023 **Based on an independent survey of 153 UK moms of 0-3m, currently use TT & used within last week, Feb 2023

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Anti-colic valve. The anti-colic valve in the nipple helps to reduce symptoms of colic by preventing excessive air from getting into your baby’s milk. Natural latch. Our bottle nipples are made from soft silicone and have a special breast-like shape that encourages a natural latch and prevents nipple confusion when switching between bottle and breast. Natural pace. The soft silicone nipple flexes and stretches like mom and allows your baby to feed comfortably at their own pace.

Most recommended baby bottle. Our Closer to Nature Anti-Colic bottles are #1 for easily switching between bottle and breast*. 100% leakproof. When the screw ring, nipple and cap are all secured, your baby bottle is completely mess-free and leakproof, even if it’s turned upside down or shaken. Easy clean and BPA free. These bottles are suitable for use in the dishwasher, microwave and sterilizers. All Tommee Tippee bottles are BPA- and phthalate-free for your ultimate reassurance.

Go with the flow. We offer different flow rates to keep up with your growing baby. Every baby is different but as a guide we suggest slow flow and vari flow for 0+months, medium flow for 3+ months and fast flow for 6+ months. Change me. Our nipples are silky soft. Change them if they get damaged or bitten by tiny teeth. Closer to Nature baby bottles are ONLY compatible with Closer to Nature nipples and cannot be used with Advanced Anti-Colic bottle nipples. Squeeze me. When assembling your baby bottle, hold the nipple up to the light to check the slit in the silicone isn’t sealed closed. If it has, pinch it gently between your fingers or with nipple tongs to re-open. If the valve has sealed closed, your bottle won’t vent properly.

Closer to Nature Closer to Nature Glass Closer to Nature Silicone Advanced Anti-Colic Bottle Material Plastic Borosilicate glass Silicone Plastic Breast-like teat for a natural latch ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Teat flexes like mum for a comfortable feed ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Anti-colic valve in teat ✓ ✓ ✓ Unique anti-colic straw draws air away from milk ✓ Sizes available: 5 Ounce, 9 Ounce, 11 Ounce 5 Ounce, 9 Ounce 5 Ounce, 9 Ounce 5 Ounce, 9 Ounce Replacement teats available: Extra Slow Flow, Slow Flow, Medium Flow, Fast Flow, Extra Cereal Flow Extra Slow Flow, Slow Flow, Medium Flow, Fast Flow, Extra Cereal Flow Extra Slow Flow, Slow Flow, Medium Flow, Fast Flow, Extra Cereal Flow Slow Flow, Medium Flow, Fast Flow BPA Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have used these bottles for all 3 of my kids and they are by far the best!
reviews.reviewText: All 3 of my kids need the slow flow nipple due to latching issues and this was the only bottle with a nipple that they were able to latch comfortably. I was also supplementing with nursing and bottle feeding and this nipple did the job. There were no issues with transitioning from breast to bottle. they are also very easy to clean but I run them through the dishwasher on the top rack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only Bottles My Son will Take
reviews.reviewText: I have tried so many bottles and these are the only ones my son likes. They are super durable and easy to assemble. Best of all they are super easy to wash. I would definitely recommend these over any other bottle brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've always loved this brand of bottle. They never leak and they truly do have the breast shape!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bottle on the market.
reviews.reviewText: These bottles are built to last. No leaks or issues. We bought 3 packs of these. They're the only bottles we have bought. Can't say enough about the quality! A+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The best bottles for breast fed babies and colic. I’ve tried all the brands and this one is our favorite !! So little parts and easy to keep clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For breastfeeding mommies who are worried about nipple shape, air bubbles, etc... This bottle has a very alluring design that could solve some feeding issues. I can't say it solved anything for us since our baby seemed pretty indifferent to the type of nipple, experienced no nipple confusion with any bottle, and the flow cause the same reaction as other nipples (for new born.)I like them enough to rate them 4/5 stars.Pros:+Shape is similar to breast.+Nipple is ambitiously different than many other too brands.+Didn't notice a negative impact on level of air baby took in. Seemed about average/expected.+Easy to clean.+Price was fair for 4 bottles.Soft-cons (more like opportunities to improve:)-The nipple sometimes bends/indents so I have to pull it out and try again.-The capacity of the bottle is decent, but the bottle is wide. I doesn't fit in our Dr. Brown's bottle warmer but fits in our momcozy one.-I have to lean the baby back quite a bit to empty the bottle. Anyone with a spitty baby knows that tilting the baby back is playing with fire.-This nipple is so big it sometimes takes me a couple of tries to get it into the ring that screws onto the bottle.-The cap is almost impossible to get off if not screwed into the bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Been using these bottles since my son was a newborn he is now 7 months still love them
Son de excelente calidad, sumamente resistente.
We love these bottles. The flow is perfect for my newborn. The bottles are good quality as is most things from tommee tippee.

Ends up we finally found a bottle baby will drink from! 3 other brands with no luck until we tried the tippee. I think she likes how soft and squishy the nipple is. Took her a couple weeks to get used to it (just continued trying once every day or 2) until one day she just latched and drank ☺️
Están super padres! y muy funcionales mi bebe no tuvo problema en agarrarlos! sin duda alguna volveré a pedir! aunque me gustaría que hubiera en color rosa
Love these bottles - no leaks, easy to hold and clean, labels look good after 3 months fulltime use (hand washing and microwave steryliser).
